mapper.insert: insert into WK_FORM_TEMPLATE ( USABLE_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_IP, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_IP, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DELETE_TIME, DELETE_IP, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_USER_NAME, ORDER_CODE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ID , TEMPLATE_NAME , TEMPLATE_HTML , TEMPLATE_FREEMARK ) values ( #{usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateHtml}, #{templateFreemark} )
mapper.delete:
delete from WK_FORM_TEMPLATE where ID in
#{item}
mapper.update:
update WK_FORM_TEMPLATE
USABLE_STATUS=#{usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_IP=#{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID=#{create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_NAME=#{create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_IP=#{modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_ID=#{modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_NAME=#{modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_TIME=#{delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_IP=#{delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLAG=#{delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_ID=#{delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_NAME=#{delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CODE=#{order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1=#{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2=#{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3=#{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4=#{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5=#{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID=#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
TEMPLATE_NAME=#{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPLATE_HTML=#{templateHtml},
TEMPLATE_FREEMARK=#{templateFreemark},
where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.USABLE_STATUS, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_FLAG, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ORDER_CODE, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE1, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE2, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE3, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE4, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE5, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ID as id, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_NAME as templateName, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_HTML as templateHtml, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_FREEMARK as templateFreemark from WK_FORM_TEMPLATE where WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ID=#{id}

select WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ID as id, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_NAME as templateName, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_HTML as templateHtml, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_FREEMARK as templateFreemark from WK_FORM_TEMPLATE
order by ${orderStr}

select WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.USABLE_STATUS, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_FLAG, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ORDER_CODE, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE1, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE2, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE3, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE4, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE5, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ID as id, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_NAME as templateName, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_HTML as templateHtml, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_FREEMARK as templateFreemark from WK_FORM_TEMPLATE
order by ${orderStr}

select WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.USABLE_STATUS, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.CREATE_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.MODIFY_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_TIME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_IP, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_FLAG, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_USER_ID, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.DELETE_USER_NAME, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ORDER_CODE, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE1, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE2, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE3, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE4, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ATTRIBUTE5, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.ID as id, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_NAME as templateName, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_HTML as templateHtml, WK_FORM_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_FREEMARK as templateFreemark from WK_FORM_TEMPLATE
order by ${orderStr}
mapper.update:
begin
update WK_FORM_TEMPLATE
USABLE_STATUS=#{item.usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_IP=#{item.create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID=#{item.create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_NAME=#{item.create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME=#{item.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_IP=#{item.modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_ID=#{item.modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_NAME=#{item.modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_TIME=#{item.delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_IP=#{item.delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLAG=#{item.delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_ID=#{item.delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_NAME=#{item.delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CODE=#{item.order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1=#{item.attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2=#{item.attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3=#{item.attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4=#{item.attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5=#{item.attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID=#{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR},
TEMPLATE_NAME=#{item.templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPLATE_HTML=#{item.templateHtml},
TEMPLATE_FREEMARK=#{item.templateFreemark},
where ID=#{item.id}
;end;
mapper.insert:
insert into WK_FORM_TEMPLATE ( USABLE_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_IP, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_IP, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DELETE_TIME, DELETE_IP, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_USER_NAME, ORDER_CODE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ID , TEMPLATE_NAME , TEMPLATE_HTML , TEMPLATE_FREEMARK )
select #{item.usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.templateHtml}, #{item.templateFreemark} from dual
